top_comments.comment: They quit because the vast majority of people don’t want to get sick from people who don’t want to take the vaccine plain and simple. People leaving work means less productivity, which means fewer goods, higher prices and shortages. The poorest will suffer most, and there will be more poor people. If governments continue benefits to unproductive people, they print money that will decrease in value, which means, in addition to already higher prices there will be hyper inflation, which means catastrophe. So... I don't really believe this "great resignation" is anything more than a fad, and hopefully not a fad that will last long.
